work-item.field:
While doing application lifecycle management you might need several link roles and a meta model of how different work items are related to each other. For our knowledge base we don´t need that much. We only need a follow up task to a question.
Adjust the link meta model according to following picture

  • Open Administration>Work Items>Enumerations
  • Create new workitem-link-role-enum.xml
  • Modify link types "follow_up"

  • All other link roles can stay as they are. A relates to link is already confgured so it doesn´t need to be modified.
Define Link Roles for Question and Related Task
